text: Skazhut te, kotoryye pridayut Yemu sotovarishchey: "Yesli by Allakh pozhelal, ni my by ne pridavali tovarishchey, ni ottsy nashi, i ne zapreshchali by nichego". Tak lgali i te, kotoryye byli do nikh, poka ne vkusili Nashey moshchi. Skazhi: "Yest' li u vas kakoye-libo znaniye? Pokazhite yego nam. Vy sleduyete tol'ko za predpolozheniyami, vy tol'ko izmyshlyayete lozh'
